column5: Gated home that is 5 minutes from Downtown Houston. This home is one block from I-10 freeway with easy access to all downtown festivities. Relax southern style with a beautiful ranch style house featuring 3 bedrooms and 1.5 baths, central a/c & heating, washer/dryer, free cable and a big screen t.v. The kitchen has a oven and refrigerator for your use.
